Package com.example.quickscanr

Class ImgHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.quickscanr.ImgHandler
public class ImgHandler extends Object
A class to upload and serve images from our firebase DB. For uploads: URI -> Bitmap -> Base64 For downloads: Base64 -> Bitmap Referenced: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9357668/how-to-store-image-in-sqlite-database https://stackoverflow.com/a/65211072
